title: Squeal like a piggy
author: VD
content_html:
59 – Bucknell
55 – Arkansas

The three-point line is there for a reason, gentlemen. And if you can shoot .550 from behind it, you should probably go ahead and do so.
content_text:
59 – Bucknell
55 – Arkansas
The three-point line is there for a reason, gentlemen.  And if you can shoot .550 from behind it, you should probably go ahead and do so.
